tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE buildings (
    building_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    owner_id INT NOT NULL,
    utility_type TEXT,
    utility_usage DECIMAL,
    utility_cost DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE UtilityUsage (
    usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    owner_id INT NOT NULL,
    utility_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    usage_value DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    usage_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (owner_id) REFERENCES Owners(owner_id)
);

CREATE TABLE utility_usage (
    usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_id INT,
    utility_type TEXT,
    usage_date DATE,
    usage_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE utility_meters (
    meter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_id INT NOT NULL,
    meter_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    install_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES building_owners(owner_id)
);

CREATE TABLE utility_readings (
    reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meter_id INT NOT NULL,
    reading_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    usage_kwh FLOAT NOT NULL,
    cost_usd DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (meter_id) REFERENCES utility_meters(meter_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UsageData (
   data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   building_id INT,
   utility_id INT,
   usage_value INT,
   cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
   FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES Buildings(building_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (utility_id) REFERENCES Utilities(utility_id)
);

CREATE TABLE BillingRecords (
   record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   owner_id INT,
   data_id INT,
   billing_date DATE,
   total_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
   FOREIGN KEY (owner_id) REFERENCES PropertyOwners(owner_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (data_id) REFERENCES UsageData(data_id)
);
